summary: A younger sister wishes to switch places with her popular older sister and the two bickering siblings awaken to find the wish has come true.
cast: Katherine Heigl|Danielle Harris|Donnie Jeffcoat|Scott Wilkinson|Mary Parker Williams|Lois Chiles|Ivey Lloyd Mitchell|Matthew Barker|Jacque Gray|Kari White|January Sorensen|Dane Stevens|Mark Hofeling|Trevor Black|Emily Klindt|Andy West|Trent Rockwood|Richard Grove|Josh James|Charles Metten|Joyce Cohen|Kimi Encarnacion|Jay Jay Encarnacion|Gugut Salgado|Tim de Pala|Sharon Brown|Barby Garcia|Joseph Larsen|Raul Moreno
title: Pide un deseo
